As good as she was, he was better. He kept telling himself all of 
this, and his prowesses did prove it too. He fired many laser bolts at 
her sword and the arm holding it and used his other laser pistol in 
her general direction. He prepared his bird-like leg for another 
thing, though, retreating the left one a bit behind.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> ????::
>

stuck

> sword while she fell, she cleary had the intention to slash him.
>
